participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and outgoing, Emily loves to connect with others and share her interests.
participant_1.background: i like tacos. i've three sisters. i love dogs. i live in alabama. i have one brother.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and hardworking, Jake finds joy in hands-on activities and is always eager to try something new.
participant_2.background: i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. i just got a job working in a gas station. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates. i'm terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. i was adopted at a young age to an older couple.
